    • Method Detail

      • createClass

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(#loc, \'MANAGER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')")
java.lang.Long createClass(dash.pojo.Class clas,
                                                                                                              dash.pojo.Location loc)
                                                                                                       throws dash.errorhandling.AppException
        Create a new class and set the current user as owner and manager.
        Parameters:
        clas - The new class to be created.
        loc - The location that offers the class.
        Returns:
        The new class ID.
        Throws:
        dash.errorhandling.AppException

      • createClasses

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(#location, \'MANAGER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')")
void createClasses(java.util.List<dash.pojo.Class> classes,
                                                                                                           dash.pojo.Location location)
                                                                                                    throws dash.errorhandling.AppException
        Create multiple groups, only available for MANAGER.
        Parameters:
        classes - The list of classes to be created
        location - The location that offers the classes.
        Throws:
        dash.errorhandling.AppException

      • getClasses

        java.util.List<dash.pojo.Class> getClasses(java.lang.String orderByInsertionDate,
                                           java.lang.Integer numberDaysToLookBack)
                                    throws dash.errorhandling.AppException
        Get all classes.
        Parameters:
        orderByInsertionDate - Define in what order the classes should be returned (must be ASC or DESC)
        numberDaysToLookBack - The number of days to look back.
        Returns:
        A list of all classes.
        Throws:
        dash.errorhandling.AppException
